title: Graduated from University of Melbourne
description: Completion to my final 2 years of academic study, and celebrating 2 years of being in Melbourne. ðŸ¥‚

title: App Development with JointSense
description: As part of a mandatory Software Engineering Project, worked with a newly founded startup JointSense to develop a mobile app to help physiotherapy students learn about joint assessments using a IMU sensor.

title: VR Software Developer Intern, Virtetic
description: Joined Virtetic as a VR Software Developer Intern to develop a globally distributed database and cloud architecture, and also develop an in-game visual leaderboard for their VR games.

title: Commenced Masters of Information Technology, University of Melbourne
ReWorld Earth
description: Joined ReWorld as a Frontend Engineer to develop their pilot website, but stuck around voluntarily because climate change is real, and we need to act now.

title: Software Engineer, Openhouse
description: Worked as a Backend Engineer to help build a platform to promote offline learning in young children. Learnt a lot about backend development, and product development.

title: Graduated from University of Delhi
description: COVID made life difficult, but I did it.

title: Freelance Web Developer
description: Worked with multiple SMBs and startups to build their websites and web applications.

title: Frontend Engineer, Blue Ocean Global Technology
description: Worked as a Frontend Engineer to help BOGT's clients.

title: Javascript Engineer Intern, Pabio
description: Got a trial internship with Pabio, and my first taste of working in a startup and with large codebases.

title: Internship Fair Portal
description: Built my first production ready project for my undergrad college, used by over 600 students.

title: Self learn programming
description: Started self learning programming with Youtube courses, and a big cloud of curiosity, and started to build my own projects.

title: Commenced Bachelors of Science in Statistics, University of Delhi
KiD Inc. - first tryst with development
description: Developed Android apps with a mate using MIT App Inventor, and published them on the Play Store. We got over 2000 total downloads in 2 years, before we discontinued due to the high school pressure.

title: Started a Youtube Channel
description: Started a Youtube Channel as a 10yo sharing Microsoft Powerpoint tutorials, and Pika Software Builder tutorials (got over 40K views). Removed the videos in 2017 when I realised I was a nerd (and the videos were cringe). Still have my loyal ~300 subscribers.
